name: choom-theme
description: CSS and CSS-in-JS theme for Choom UI

scripts.build:env: babel src -d dist && babel src/*.css -d dist --copy-files
scripts.build:esm: NODE_ENV=esm babel src -d dist/esm && babel src/*.css -d dist/esm --copy-files
scripts.build: yarn cleanup && yarn setup && yarn build:env && yarn build:esm
